description: This resource schema represents the ResourceCollection resource in the Amazon DevOps Guru.

ResourceCollectionFilter.description: Information about a filter used to specify which AWS resources are analyzed for anomalous behavior by DevOps Guru.
ResourceCollectionFilter.markdownDescription:
Information about a filter used to specify which AWS resources are analyzed for anomalous behavior by DevOps Guru.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudFormationCollectionFilter.description: CloudFormation resource for DevOps Guru to monitor

StackNames.description: An array of CloudFormation stack names.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z*]+[a-zA-Z0-9-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

StackNames.markdownDescription:
An array of CloudFormation stack names.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
